message.body: Kathy has been feeling sick all day and is now feeling worse. We are going to pass on dinner.
Okay if we pick up dog and drill on way home from work tomorrow?
Ok. Sorry she's sick. All will be ready for you tomorrow night if uou can stop for dinner. Or come tonight if Kathy would enjoy some quiet time.?
We will just grab dog and tools tomorrow, New Year's Eve and all.
I forgot. I'll be leaving about 3 pm, XD might be here. If not door will be left unlocked.
Does XD stand for Extremely Dangerous?
Yes! And a great cook for Chinese food. I've been enjoying his meals.
you get out a little early. Love, mom
Sweetheart, i'll leave door unlocked and drill in bag next to door. Please lock behind you. X.D. may be here, not back yet from his bike ride. Hope
AAA is coming. Would you like us to pick up Jack and have him come to grandma's house for a surprise overnight. I can handle one not two.
No thank you, I don't want him to be 'rewarded' for his bad behavior.
He is in his room for the night. No book. No song.
Hopefully when he wakes up, if he ever falls asleep, he will be more compliant.
'm throwing a neighborhood party at 4 pm. Jack can help.
I'll check in with you once we're started. Maybe he'll sleep through the night. You can drop him off tomorrow if it will help.. again, one not two. I
I'm not rewarding him for being bad. If I drop off one kid, but not the other, how do you think the other kid would feel?
If I send just Craig it is cruel to Jack and Vice versa
